peril.model.combat

Class ModelSquad

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.combat.ModelSquad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ModelSquadMember>

    public final class ModelSquad
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Iterable<ModelSquadMember>
    A squad of ModelSquadMembers that originated from a ModelArmy and will be used in combat by the CombatHelper. This cannot exceed its maximum size.
    Since:
    2018-02-25
    Version:
    1.01.05
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelSquadMember, ModelSquadMemberState, CombatHelper, Observable, Iterable

      The maximum size of this ModelSquad.
      private java.util.List<ModelSquadMember> members
      The List of ModelSquadMembers that make up this ModelSquad.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void autoPopulate(ModelArmy army, int minArmySize)
      Constructs the strongest ModelSquad from the specified ModelArmy leaving the the ModelArmy with at least the minimum number of ModelUnits specified.
      void clear()
      Removes all the ModelSquadMembers dead or alive from this ModelSquad without returning them to their source army.

      Retrieves the combined strength of all the alive ModelSquadMembers in this ModelSquad.

      Retrieves the number of ModelSquadMembers that are alive in this ModelSquad.

      Retrieves the Iterator that iterates over each ModelSquadMember of this ModelSquad.
      boolean killUnit(ModelUnit unit)
      Attempts to find a ModelSquadMember with the specified ModelUnit in this ModelSquad and kill it.
      void moveToSquad(ModelUnit unit, ModelArmy army)
      Moves a specified ModelUnit from the specified ModelArmy to this ModelSquad.
      void removeNonActiveUnits()
      Removes all the ModelSquadMembers that are not ModelSquadMemberState.ALIVE from this ModelSquad.
      void returnSquadToArmy(ModelArmy army)
      Returns all the ModelSquadMembers from this ModelSquad to the Specified ModelArmy.
      void returnUnitToArmy(ModelArmy army, ModelSquadMember member)
      Returns a specified ModelSquadMember from this ModelSquad to the the specified ModelArmy.

      The number of ModelSquadMembers in this ModelSquad that are dead or alive.

        The number of ModelSquadMembers in this ModelSquad that are dead or alive.

      • autoPopulate

        public void autoPopulate(ModelArmy army,
                         int minArmySize)
        Constructs the strongest ModelSquad from the specified ModelArmy leaving the the ModelArmy with at least the minimum number of ModelUnits specified.
        Parameters:
        army - The source ModelArmy.
        minArmySize - The minimum number of model units to be left in the ModelArmy.

      • geStrength

        public int geStrength()
        Retrieves the combined strength of all the alive ModelSquadMembers in this ModelSquad.
        Returns:
        The combined strength of all the alive ModelSquadMembers in this ModelSquad

      • killUnit

        public boolean killUnit(ModelUnit unit)
        Attempts to find a ModelSquadMember with the specified ModelUnit in this ModelSquad and kill it. If no such ModelUnit exists in this ModelSquad this will return false;
        Parameters:
        unit - The ModelUnit to kill.
        Returns:
        Whether the specified ModelUnit was killed our not.

      • returnUnitToArmy

        public void returnUnitToArmy(ModelArmy army,
                             ModelSquadMember member)
        Returns a specified ModelSquadMember from this ModelSquad to the the specified ModelArmy.
        Parameters:
        army - The ModelArmy the ModelUnit will be returned to.
        member - The ModelSquadMember that will be returned to the ModelArmy.

        army - The source ModelArmy of the ModelUnit.
